title: EOD Update
text:
GDC Internship Format:

EOD Calls will be conducted every day at 7.30 over Zoom:

Everyone should update their EOD Updates on this slack channel regardless of attendance in Zoom and regardless of how high/low your productivity was for the day.

Link to EOD Call:
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87914873931

Weekly Reviews would be conducted at 7.30 PM every Tuesday
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/85188928844

You will have to submit a Google Form report every week at:
weekly.coronasafe.in
The weekly report will be required for you to be considered active for the internship.
